name: Wobbly Towers
description:
Wobbly Towers is a simple stacking bricks game I've made with the Godot Game Engine. It is build with touch (mobile) in mind but also works good on desktop.

Controls:   
Arrow keys  to  move  bricks, Ctrl to rotate

Your goal is to built as high as you can get with loosing almost no brick.

  • you can freeze blocks in place for a short time
  • or connect them with a chain to a near floating island
